author: Danielle L. Jensen
title: A Fate Inked in Blood: Book One of the Saga of the Unfated
description:
A Fate Inked in Blood: Book One of the Saga of the Unfated by Danielle L. Jensen is an epic Norse-inspired fantasy brimming with action, romance, and intrigue.
The story follows the life of a shieldmaiden whose destiny is intertwined with a prophecy foretold by the gods. Bound by forces beyond her control, she must navigate a treacherous world of myth and politics while balancing loyalty, love, and survival. Her journey pits her against ruthless enemies and tests her strength as she faces betrayal and dark secrets that could alter her fateâ€”and the fate of the world.
Fans of rich world-building, fierce heroines, and Viking lore will be captivated by this first installment of an enthralling saga.
